name: Exelio
summary:
A 2.5D survival game with action RPG elements being developed in Unreal Engine 5 by a small team of veteran developers from Japan. They are working with generative AI technologies to try efficiently creating a next-gen quality game with a small team that will surpass player expectations.

Gameplay has not been shown publicly but a demo designed for the Steam Deck is set to be playable at TGS 2023 and the game is planned for release in the first half of 2024 on PC.
